result.execSummary:
The defendant John E Metzger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. John E Metzger is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • John E Metzger was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • John E Metzger was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant John E Metzger in court with attorney Tristan F Eagon. Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Eagon requesting new date, now defendant would like to resolve case, Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 2 and Ct. 3, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 1 dismissed, 15 CF 294, Ct. 2 and Ct. 3, Court withholds sentence, probation 2 years, Ct. 2, 30 days jail w/Huber, Jail start date at 11/1/15 7:00 P.M., $543.00 costs, AODA and comply, Domestic Abuse Counseling, absolute sobriety, provide DNA Sample, Ct. 3, $343.00 costs, AODA and comply, Domestic Abuse Counseling, absolute sobriety, provide DNA Sample, Defendant to report to probation and parole tomorrow by 4:00 P.M., bond to be applied

Defendant John E Metzger in court, in custody with attorney Adam Raabe.  Clifford Chase Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  New pretrial and return date requested by Atty Raabe.  Atty Raabe requested a bond modification today.  State objected.  Bond argument by state and defense.  Court advised atty Raabe to address bond modification in writing.  Court denied contact with victim motion.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 9, 2015 at 08:40 am.  Return date scheduled for October 20, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
